text: Cac nguoi (nhung nguoi chong) se chang the nao cong bang (tuyet oi trong viec oi xu) voi cac nguoi vo (cua cac nguoi) cho du cac nguoi co co gang ra sao. Tuy nhien, cac nguoi cung cho ung nghieng han ve nguoi (vo) nay va bo mac nguoi (vo) kia nhu la mot an phat tu treo. Do o, neu (vo chong) cac nguoi biet cai thien va biet kinh so (Allah) thi chac chan Allah hang tha thu, khoan dung
